attributes.action: stop funding the EU until it starts to stop the massive fraud and corruption which exists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of fraud which exists within the European Union is disgusting. The EU seem to not want to do anything about it. It  sacked the chief accountant of the EU Marta Andreasen for revealing the amount of corruption and stopped her from becoming Vice Chairman of the Budget Committee when she was elected as an MEP in case of furthur criticism. The country is short of money but tax payers money is being handed to fraudsters.
